markdownRemark.html:
Why all the work?

Why switching to a new site generator?

Is it all just an elaborate strategy for some cultivated procrastination?

This is the amount of posts that I've written since 2004.

I was considering doing some spin doctoring on how things are going downhill, and maybe they are!

One unfortunate side-effect of crossing my 30ies and then my 40ies is that I think a lot more about where to put my energy. There is my family, and there is responsibility. There is a very focused product development and then there is that thing that I've written about programming in the previous years, but these days it is also interesting to think about different things - about how software is developed, and on a grander scale, about where we as a whole are going - in developing a product, the technical side of things isn't incredibly exciting - boring decisions and simple programming is a good thing these days.
